revised_title: Systematic Construction of Thin Cemented Aplanatic Lenses for Optical Instruments
tldr: This article presents systematic constructional tables for thin cemented aplanatic lenses made of two refracting media. The tables provide information for designing lenses with magnification and an object at infinity. They also help in selecting glasses for better optical instruments and improving chromatic correction. The tables cover a wide range of refractive indices, making them useful for various applications in physics and optics.
